html:
As I say in my YouTube videos, without further ado 🥁 SCH Certification IS HERE!

No more build-up, no more wait. The students of the Smart Contract Hacking course can already head over to the Blockchain Security Academy and take the Final Assessment 🥸👇

— JohnnyTime 🤓🔥 (@RealJohnnyTime) December 20, 2023

A few members of our team built an onchain game powered by autonomous NPCs at EthGlobal Online and won! 🏆✨

Here's the story of the game, next steps, and how you can get early access: https://t.co/zReGpfA4cE pic.twitter.com/TTWwERSUNt

— Pinata (@pinatacloud) November 3, 2023
